user.description: Input IP address of Z-Way server and Z-Way access token. IP address can be prefixed with wss:// if HTTPS should be used instead of HTTP. To get the token go to the Z-Way user interface > Menu > Settings > User > API token. It is suggested to create a new user for Home Assistant and grant access to devices you need to control from Home Assistant. It is also possible to use remote access via find.z-wave.me to connect a remote Z-Way. Input wss://find.z-wave.me in IP field and copy the token with Global scope (log-in to Z-Way via find.z-wave.me for this).
